JsonTreeModel API  v0.1.0
A Qt tree model for visualizing and manipulating a JSON document.
jsontreemodel.h

9 #ifndef JSONTREEMODEL_H
10 #define JSONTREEMODEL_H
11 
12 #include <QAbstractItemModel>
13 
14 #include <QJsonObject>
15 #include <QJsonArray>
16 
17 //=================================
18 // JsonTreeModelNode and subclasses
19 //=================================
20 /*
21  If only we could get a QJsonValueRef to a nested item,
22  we wouldn't need such "heavy" node classes...
23 */
24 /*
25  TODO: Documentation
26  TODO: Support user-defined Structure and Scalar column names
27  TODO: Support user-defined icons for different datatypes in Structure column???
28  TODO: Support user-defined font for Array indices in Structure column???
29 */
30 class JsonTreeModelNode
31 {
32 public:
33  enum Type {
34  Scalar,
35  Object,
36  Array
37  };
38 
39  JsonTreeModelNode(JsonTreeModelNode* parent) : m_parent(parent) {}
40  virtual ~JsonTreeModelNode() {}
41 
42  inline JsonTreeModelNode* parent() const
43  { return m_parent; }
44 
45  inline void setParent(JsonTreeModelNode* parent)
46  { Q_ASSERT(parent->type() != Scalar); m_parent = parent; } // FIXME: This currently creates an inconsistent state if the node is a child of JsonTreeModelListNode
47 
48  virtual Type type() const = 0;
49  virtual QJsonValue value() const = 0;
50 
51 private:
52  // NOTE: Only JsonTreeModelListNode can be a parent, but I don't want to introduce a dependency to a subclass
53  JsonTreeModelNode* m_parent;
54 };
55 
56 class JsonTreeModelScalarNode : public JsonTreeModelNode
57 {
58 public:
59  JsonTreeModelScalarNode(const QJsonValue& value, JsonTreeModelNode* parent);
60 
61  QJsonValue value() const override
62  { return m_value; }
63 
64  void setValue(const QJsonValue& value)
65  { m_value = value; }
66 
67  Type type() const override
68  { return Scalar; }
69 
70 private:
71  QJsonValue m_value;
72 };
73 
74 class JsonTreeModelListNode : public JsonTreeModelNode
75 {
76 public:
77  JsonTreeModelListNode(JsonTreeModelNode* parent) : JsonTreeModelNode(parent) {}
78  JsonTreeModelListNode(const QJsonArray& arr, JsonTreeModelNode* parent);
79 
80  ~JsonTreeModelListNode()
81  {
82  // TODO: Tell parent to remove this child from its list? Only if we do partial deletions
83  qDeleteAll(m_childList);
84  }
85 
86  inline JsonTreeModelNode* childAt(int i) const
87  { return m_childList[i]; }
88 
89  inline int childCount() const
90  { return m_childList.count(); }
91 
92  inline int childPosition(JsonTreeModelNode* child) const
93  { return m_childPositions.value(child, -1); }
94 
95  Type type() const override
96  { return Array; }
97 
98  QJsonValue value() const override;
99 
100 protected:
101  void addChild(JsonTreeModelNode* child);
102 
103 private:
104  QVector<JsonTreeModelNode*> m_childList;
105  QMap<JsonTreeModelNode*, int> m_childPositions;
106 };
107 
108 class JsonTreeModelNamedListNode : public JsonTreeModelListNode
109 {
110 public:
111  JsonTreeModelNamedListNode(const QJsonObject& obj, JsonTreeModelNode* parent);
112 
113  inline QString childListNodeName(JsonTreeModelNode* child) const
114  { return m_childListNodeNames[child]; }
115 
116  inline int namedScalarCount() const
117  { return m_namedScalarMap.size(); }
118 
119  inline QJsonValue namedScalarValue(const QString& name) const
120  { return m_namedScalarMap[name]; }
121 
122  inline void setNamedScalarValue(const QString& name, const QJsonValue& value)
123  {
124  Q_ASSERT(value.type() != QJsonValue::Undefined && value.type() != QJsonValue::Array && value.type() != QJsonValue::Object);
125  m_namedScalarMap[name] = value;
126  }
127 
128  Type type() const override
129  { return Object; }
130 
131  QJsonValue value() const override;
132 
133 private:
134  // TODO: Use JsonTreeModelListNode::childPosition() for indexing; not need for map with m_childListNodeNames
135  QMap<JsonTreeModelNode*, QString> m_childListNodeNames;
136  QMap<QString, QJsonValue> m_namedScalarMap;
137 };
138 
139 class JsonTreeModelWrapperNode : public JsonTreeModelListNode
140 {
141 public:
142  JsonTreeModelWrapperNode(JsonTreeModelNamedListNode* realNode);
143 
144  QJsonValue value() const override
145  { return childAt(0)->value(); } // ASSUMPTION: A wrapper node will always have exactly 1 child JsonTreeModelNamedListNode
146 };
147 
148 
149 //=================================
150 // JsonTreeModel itself
151 //=================================
152 class JsonTreeModel : public QAbstractItemModel
153 {
154  Q_OBJECT
155 
156 public:
157  // TODO: Add flag to sort the keys, or leave them in the order of discovery
158  enum ScalarColumnSearchMode
159  {
160  NoSearch,
161  QuickSearch,
162  ComprehensiveSearch
163  };
164 
165  explicit JsonTreeModel(QObject* parent = nullptr);
166  ~JsonTreeModel() { delete m_rootNode; }
167 
168  // Header:
169  QVariant headerData(int section, Qt::Orientation orientation, int role = Qt::DisplayRole) const override;
170 
171  // Basic functionality:
172  QModelIndex index(int row, int column, const QModelIndex& parent = QModelIndex()) const override;
173  QModelIndex parent(const QModelIndex& index) const override;
174 
175  int rowCount(const QModelIndex& parent = QModelIndex()) const override;
176  int columnCount(const QModelIndex& parent = QModelIndex()) const override;
177 
178  QVariant data(const QModelIndex& index, int role = Qt::DisplayRole) const override;
179 
180  // Editable:
181  bool setData(const QModelIndex& index, const QVariant& value, int role = Qt::EditRole) override;
182  Qt::ItemFlags flags(const QModelIndex& index) const override;
183 
184  // API specific to JsonTreeModel:
185  void setJson(const QJsonArray& array, ScalarColumnSearchMode searchMode = QuickSearch);
186  void setJson(const QJsonObject& object, ScalarColumnSearchMode searchMode = QuickSearch);
187  QJsonValue json(const QModelIndex& index = QModelIndex()) const;
188 
189  // TODO: Decide if the json()/setJson() API should be symmetrical or not
190 
191  void setScalarColumns(const QStringList& columns);
192  QStringList scalarColumns() const { return m_headers.mid(2); }
193 
194 private:
195  static QSet<QString> findScalarNames(const QJsonValue& data, bool comprehensive); // TODO: Make this a static function in the .cpp
196  bool isEditable(const QModelIndex& index) const;
197 
198  JsonTreeModelListNode* m_rootNode;
199  QStringList m_headers;
200 };
201 
202 #endif // JSONTREEMODEL_H
JsonTreeModel
The JsonTreeModel class provides a data model for a JSON document.
